abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.text: While a friendly figure is defending, and the Royal Guard is adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 {G} to the defensive results. Limit 1 "Sentinel" or "Protector" ability used per attack.

abilities.name: Vengeance
abilities.text: When an adjacent, friendly, non-GUARDIAN figure is defeated, the Royal Guard becomes Focused.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.text: While a friendly figure is defending, and the Royal Guard is adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 {G} to the defensive results. Limit 1 "Sentinel" or "Protector"ability used per attack.

abilities.name: Forward Vengeance
abilities.text: When an adjacent, friendly, non-GUARDIAN figure is defeated, the Royal Guard becomes Focused and moves 1 space toward the nearest healthy Rebel.

abilities.name: Awkward
abilities.text: The AT-ST cannot attack adjacent figures.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.text: When a Trandoshan Hunter declares an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 {C}.

abilities.name: Scattergun
abilities.text: While attacking, if the Trandoshan Hunter is adjacent to the target, apply +1 {H} to the attack results.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.text: When a Trandoshan Hunter declares an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 {C}.

abilities.name: ACP Scattergun
abilities.text: While attacking, if the Trandoshan Hunter is adjacent to the target, apply +2 {H} to the attack results.
